item.title: First Post
item.description: Below is just about everything you’ll need to style in the theme. Check the source code to see the many embedded elements within paragraphs. Mathjax 1 LaTeX math delimiters: \\(a^2 + b^2 = c^2\\) or “\(a^2 + b^2 = c^2\)” for inline math \(a^2 + b^2 = c^2\); and \\[a^2 + b^2 = c^2\\] for displayed equations \[a^2 + b^2 = c^2\].
